stockDataRoot

'C:\\Users\\ikedi\\secData2'
{% endraw %}

We download SEC data using requests. We retry a few times in case of a temporary internet glitch, and also recognize an SEC-specific temporary outage message and raise an Exception for it.

{% raw %}

requestUrl[source]

requestUrl(url, timeout=5.0, nTries=3, returnText=False, **kwargs)

Downloads a URL using the requests package.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

downloadSecUrl[source]

downloadSecUrl(secSubUrl)

Downloads a url from the SEC site, checking for a temporary outage message.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
t = downloadSecUrl('')
assert 'securities and exchange' in t.lower()
{% endraw %}
